title: Caratheodory's extension theorem
content: In this section, we define a function ` toOMeas ` which constructs an outer measure, from a pre-measure ` R ` . An explicit generic definition of an outer measure is not given. It consists of the three following statements: - the outer measure of an empty set is zero ( ~ oms0 ) - it is monotone ( ~ omsmon ) - it is countably sub-additive ( ~ omssubadd ) See Definition 1.11.1 of [Bogachev] p. 41.

df-oms
blocks.content: Define a function constructing an outer measure. See ~ omsval for its value. Definition 1.5 of [Bogachev] p. 16. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-oms(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(coms, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cpw(cuni(cdm(cv(s0)))), cinf(crn(cmpt(s2, crab(s3, cpw(cdm(cv(s0))), wa(wss(cv(s1), cuni(cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s3), cdom, com))), cesum(s4, cv(s2), cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-oms(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ toOMeas =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(s0))‚Ü¶ inf(ran((s2 ‚àà { s3 ‚àà P(dom(s0))|(s1 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s3 ‚àß s3[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s4 ‚àà s2,(s0 ` s4)))),(0[[,]]+‚àû), <)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
}

  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)

  -| diffss(s2, s3)

  mpteq12dv(s0, cpw(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0)))), cinf(crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), cesum(s3, cv(s1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), cinf(crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), cesum(s3, cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s3))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  pweqd(cuni(cdm(cv(hs0))), cuni(cdm(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieqd(cdm(cv(hs0)), cdm(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  infeq1d(crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), cesum(s3, cv(s1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt, crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), cesum(s3, cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s3))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  rneqd(cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), cesum(s3, cv(s1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)))), cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), cesum(s3, cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s3)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  mpteq12dv(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), cesum(s3, cv(s1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3))), crab(s2, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), cesum(s3, cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s3))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(crab(s2, cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), crab(s2, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com)))), wceq(cpw(cdm(cv(hs0))), cpw(cdm(c0))))

  diff.hs0.c(cmpt(s0, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), cinf(crn(cmpt(s1, crab(s2, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s2), cdom, com))), cesum(s3, cv(s1), cfv(c0, cv(s3))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt)))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)

  diff.hs0.s(s0)

thm omsval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Üí(toOMeas ` c0)=(s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))‚Ü¶ inf(ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(c0 ` s3)))),(0[[,]]+‚àû), <)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, c0)
} = {
  fvmptd3(hs0, coms, c0, (s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))‚Ü¶ inf(ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(c0 ` s3)))),(0[[,]]+‚àû), <)), universe, (s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(hs0))‚Ü¶ inf(ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(hs0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(hs0 ` s3)))),(0[[,]]+‚àû), <)), universe, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  df-oms(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3)
  mpteq12dv(s0, P(‚ãÉ dom(hs0)), inf(ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(hs0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(hs0 ` s3)))),(0[[,]]+‚àû), <), P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), inf(ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(c0 ` s3)))),(0[[,]]+‚àû), <), hs0 = c0)
  pweqd(‚ãÉ dom(hs0), ‚ãÉ dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  unieqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  infeq1d(ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(hs0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(hs0 ` s3)))), (0[[,]]+‚àû), clt, ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(c0 ` s3)))), hs0 = c0)
  rneqd((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(hs0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(hs0 ` s3))), (s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(c0 ` s3))), hs0 = c0)
  mpteq12dv(s1, { s2 ‚àà P(dom(hs0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)}, sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(hs0 ` s3)), { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)}, sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(c0 ` s3)), hs0 = c0)
  syl(hs0 = c0, { s2 ‚àà P(dom(hs0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} = { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)}, P(dom(hs0))= P(dom(c0)))
  pweqd(dom(hs0), dom(c0), hs0 = c0)
  dmeq(hs0, c0)
  rabeq(s2, P(dom(hs0)), P(dom(c0)), (s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om))
  esumeq2dv(s3, s1, (hs0 ` s3), (c0 ` s3), hs0 = c0)
  fveq1d(hs0, s3, c0, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß s3 ‚àà s1))
  simpl(hs0 = c0, s3 ‚àà s1)
  id(c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  4syl(c0 ‚àà ùïå, (s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))‚Ü¶ inf(ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(c0 ` s3)))),(0[[,]]+‚àû), <))‚àà ùïå, dom(c0)‚àà ùïå, ‚ãÉ dom(c0)‚àà ùïå, P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))‚àà ùïå)
  dmexg(c0, universe)
  uniexg(dom(c0), universe)
  pwexg(‚ãÉ dom(c0), universe)
  mptexg(s0, P(‚ãÉ dom(c0)), universe, inf(ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(c0 ` s3)))),(0[[,]]+‚àû), <))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((s0 ‚àà P(‚ãÉ dom(c0))‚Ü¶ inf(ran((s1 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà P(dom(c0))|(s0 ‚äÜ ‚ãÉ s2 ‚àß s2[‚âº]_om)} ‚Ü¶ sum*(s3 ‚àà s1,(c0 ` s3)))),(0[[,]]+‚àû), <)))
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cpw.s(s2, dom(hs0))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s2, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s2, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, ‚ãÉ dom(c0))
  diff.cuni.s(s0, dom(c0))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c0)
}

blocks.name: omsfval
blocks.content: Value of the outer measure evaluated for a given set ` A ` . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omsfval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wss(c3, cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(coms, c2), c3), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c2)), wa(wss(c3, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wss(c3, cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(coms, c2), c3), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c2)), wa(wss(c3, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wss(c3, cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(coms, c2), c3), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c2)), wa(wss(c3, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wss(c3, cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(coms, c2), c3), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c2)), wa(wss(c3, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wss(c3, cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(coms, c2), c3), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c2)), wa(wss(c3, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt))), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wf(c2, c0, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wss(c3, cuni(c0))), wceq(cfv(cfv(coms, c2), c3), cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c2)), wa(wss(c3, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt))), diffsc(s2, c3))

blocks.name: oms0

blocks.name: omsmon
blocks.content: A constructed outer measure is monotone. Note in Example 1.5.2 of [Bogachev] p. 17. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2020.)

blocks.name: omssubaddlem
blocks.content: For any small margin ` E ` , we can find a covering approaching the outer measure of a set ` A ` by that margin. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm omssubaddlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), wbr(cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s2))), clt, co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(coms, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, c4, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c1, cuni(c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, crp))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), wbr(cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s2))), clt, co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3)))), diffsw(s0, w0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), wbr(cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s2))), clt, co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3)))), diffsw(s1, w0))

  mp2and(w0, wrex(hs0, crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s2))))), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3))), wcel(co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wbr(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s2))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt), clt, co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3)))
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3), cxr), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3)))
  rexrd(co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3), w0)
  readdcld(cfv(c2, c1), c3, w0)
  addge0d(cfv(c2, c1), c3, w0)
  rpred(c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  ffvelrnd(c2, c1, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), w0)
  sylibr(w0, wf(c2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(cfv(coms, c0), cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

  feq1i(c2, cpw(cuni(cdm(c0))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cfv(coms, c0))
  simprbi(wcel(cfv(c2, c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(c2, c1)), wcel(cfv(c2, c1), cxr))
  elxrge0(cfv(c2, c1))
  rpge0d(c3, w0)
  elxrge0(co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3))
  eqbrtrd(cinf(crn(cmpt(s0, crab(s1, cpw(cdm(c0)), wa(wss(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com))), cesum(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s2))))), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), clt), clt, co(cfv(c2, c1), caddc, c3), cfv(c2, c1), w0)

blocks.name: omssubadd
blocks.content: A constructed outer measure is countably sub-additive. Lemma 1.5.4 of [Bogachev] p. 17. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Sep-2019.) (Revised by AV, 4-Oct-2020.)

blocks.content: Define a function constructing Caratheodory measurable sets for a given outer measure. See ~ carsgval for its value. Definition 1.11.2 of [Bogachev] p. 41. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.)

blocks.content: Value of the Caratheodory sigma-Algebra construction function. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm carsgval(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ccarsg, c0), crab(s0, cpw(c1), wral(s1, cpw(c1), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(s1), cv(s0))), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cpw(c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {

thm carsgcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(cfv(ccarsg, c0), cpw(c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

} = {
  syl6eqss(cfv(ccarsg, c0), cpw(c1), crab(hs1, cpw(c1), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), w0)
  carsgval(hs1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  ssrab2(hs1, cpw(c1), wral(hs0, cpw(c1), wceq(co(cfv(c0, cin(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), cxad, cfv(c0, cdif(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs1.s(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.c(cpw(c1))
}

blocks.name: carsguni
blocks.content: The union of all Caratheodory measurable sets is the universe. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm carsguni(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cuni(cfv(ccarsg, c0)), c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cpw(c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0))
} = {
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(cuni(cfv(ccarsg, c0)), c1), wss(cuni(cfv(ccarsg, c0)), c1), wcel(c1, cfv(ccarsg, c0)))
  sylibr(w0, wss(cuni(cfv(ccarsg, c0)), c1), wral(hs0, cfv(ccarsg, c0), wss(cv(hs0), c1)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(ccarsg, c0), w0, wss(cv(hs0), c1))
  elpwid(cv(hs0), c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccarsg, c0))))
  sselda(cv(hs0), cfv(ccarsg, c0), cpw(c1), w0)
  carsgcl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  unissb(hs0, cfv(ccarsg, c0), c1)
  baselcarsg(c1, c0, c2, w0)
  unissel(cfv(ccarsg, c0), c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ccarsg, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

  oveq12d(cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1))), cxad, cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), cdif(c0, c1))), cfv(c2, cdif(cv(hs0), c1)), cfv(c2, cin(cv(hs0), c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))))

  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(c0))), wceq(cin(cv(hs0), c0), cv(hs0)), wss(cv(hs0), c0))

thm difelcarsg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 \ c1)‚àà(toCaraSiga ` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c2 : P(c0)‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(toCaraSiga ` c2))
} = {
  mpbird(w0, (c0 \ c1)‚àà(toCaraSiga ` c2), ((c0 \ c1)‚äÜ c0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c0),((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ(c0 \ c1)))[+](c2 `(hs0 \(c0 \ c1))))=(c2 ` hs0))))
  jca(w0, (c0 \ c1)‚äÜ c0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c0),((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ(c0 \ c1)))[+](c2 `(hs0 \(c0 \ c1))))=(c2 ` hs0)))
  difssd(c0, c1, w0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, P(c0), w0, ((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ(c0 \ c1)))[+](c2 `(hs0 \(c0 \ c1))))=(c2 ` hs0))
  3eqtrd(((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ(c0 \ c1)))[+](c2 `(hs0 \(c0 \ c1)))), (c2 ` hs0), ((c2 `(hs0 \ c1))[+](c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))), ((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))[+](c2 `(hs0 \ c1))), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  oveq12d((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ(c0 \ c1))), cxad, (c2 `(hs0 \(c0 \ c1))), (c2 `(hs0 \ c1)), (c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  fveq2d(c2, (hs0 ‚ãÇ(c0 \ c1)), (hs0 \ c1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  syl5eq((hs0 ‚ãÇ(c0 \ c1)), (hs0 \ c1), ((hs0 ‚ãÇ c0)\ c1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  indif2(hs0, c0, c1)
  difeq1d((hs0 ‚ãÇ c0), c1, hs0, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  sylib((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c0)= hs0, hs0 ‚äÜ c0)
  df-ss(hs0, c0)
  fveq2d(c2, (hs0 \(c0 \ c1)), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c1), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  syl5eq((hs0 \(c0 \ c1)), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c1), ((hs0 \ c0)‚ãÉ(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  difdif2(hs0, c0, c1)
  syl6eq(((hs0 \ c0)‚ãÉ(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1)), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c1), (‚àÖ ‚ãÉ(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1)), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  uneq1d((hs0 \ c0), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c1), emptycls, (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  sylib((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)), (hs0 \ c0)= ‚àÖ, hs0 ‚äÜ c0)

  elpwi(hs0, c0)
  ssdif0(hs0, c0)
  eqtr3i((‚àÖ ‚ãÉ(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1)), (hs0 ‚ãÇ c1), ((hs0 ‚ãÇ c1)‚ãÉ ‚àÖ))
  uncom((hs0 ‚ãÇ c1), emptycls)
  un0((hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)), ((c2 `(hs0 \ c1))[+](c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1)))=((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))[+](c2 `(hs0 \ c1))), (c2 `(hs0 \ c1))‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  sseldi((c2 `(hs0 \ c1)), cxr, (0[[,]]+‚àû), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))
  ffvelrnd(c2, (hs0 \ c1), (0[[,]]+‚àû), P(c0), (w0 ‚àß hs0 ‚àà P(c0)))

  simprd(w0, ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà P(c0),((c2 `(hs0 ‚ãÇ c1))[+](c2 `(hs0 \ c1)))=(c2 ` hs0)), c1 ‚äÜ c0)

blocks.name: unelcarsg
blocks.content: The Caratheodory-measurable sets are closed under pairwise unions. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm unelcarsg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cun(c0, c1), cfv(ccarsg, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, cpw(c3), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(ccarsg, c2)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cpw(c3)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c3))), wbr(cfv(c2, cun(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cle, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cxad, cfv(c2, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ccarsg, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cun(c0, c1), cfv(ccarsg, c2), cun(cdif(c3, cdif(c3, c0)), cdif(c3, cdif(c3, c1))), w0)
  uneq12d(cdif(c3, cdif(c3, c0)), cdif(c3, cdif(c3, c1)), c0, c1, w0)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cdif(c3, cdif(c3, c0)), c0), wss(c0, c3))
  elcarsgss(c0, c3, c4, c2, w0)
  dfss4(c0, c3)
  sylib(w0, wceq(cdif(c3, cdif(c3, c1)), c1), wss(c1, c3))
  elcarsgss(c1, c3, c4, c2, w0)
  dfss4(c1, c3)
  syl5eqelr(cun(cdif(c3, cdif(c3, c0)), cdif(c3, cdif(c3, c1))), cfv(ccarsg, c2), cdif(c3, cin(cdif(c3, c0), cdif(c3, c1))), w0)
  difindi(c3, cdif(c3, c0), cdif(c3, c1))
  difelcarsg(c3, cin(cdif(c3, c0), cdif(c3, c1)), c2, c4, w0)
  inelcarsg(s0, s1, cdif(c3, c0), cdif(c3, c1), c2, c3, c4, w0)
  difelcarsg(c3, c0, c2, c4, w0)
  difelcarsg(c3, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c3, c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c3, c1)
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c3, c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c3, c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ‚ãÉ c1)‚àà(toCaraSiga ` c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà(toCaraSiga ` c2))

  elcarsgss(c0, c3, c4, c2, w0)
  dfss4(c0, c3)
  sylib(w0, (c3 \(c3 \ c1))= c1, c1 ‚äÜ c3)
  elcarsgss(c1, c3, c4, c2, w0)
  dfss4(c1, c3)

  difindi(c3, (c3 \ c0), (c3 \ c1))
  difelcarsg(c3, ((c3 \ c0)‚ãÇ(c3 \ c1)), c2, c4, w0)
  inelcarsg(s0, s1, (c3 \ c0), (c3 \ c1), c2, c3, c4, w0)
  difelcarsg(c3, c0, c2, c4, w0)
  difelcarsg(c3, c1, c2, c4, w0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c3, c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c3, c1)
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c3, c0)
  diff.cdif.s(s1, c3, c1)

thm carsgmon(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

} = {

  ssexd(c1, c2, cpw(c3), w0)

  vtocl2g(s0, s1, c1, universe, c2, cpw(c3), wi(w3a(w0, wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cpw(c3))), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2))), wi(w3a(w0, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c3))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))), wi(w3a(w0, wss(c1, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c3))), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w3a(w0, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c3))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), w3a(w0, wss(c1, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c3))), wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  3anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c3)), wss(c1, cv(s1)))
  sseq1(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))

  3anbi23d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), w0, wss(c1, cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c3)), wss(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cpw(c3)))
  sseq2(cv(s1), c2, c1)
  eleq1(cv(s1), c2, cpw(c3))

  imbi12d(s0 = c1, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚äÜ s1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà P(c3)), (c0 ` s0)[‚â§](c0 ` s1), (w0 ‚àß c1 ‚äÜ s1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà P(c3)), (c0 ` c1)[‚â§](c0 ` s1))
  3anbi2d(s0 = c1, w0, s0 ‚äÜ s1, s1 ‚àà P(c3), c1 ‚äÜ s1)
  sseq1(s0, c1, s1)

blocks.name: fiunelcarsg
blocks.content: The Caratheodory measurable sets are closed under finite union. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm fiunelcarsg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cpw(c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wss(cv(s0), cpw(c2))), wbr(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s0))), cle, cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), cfv(ccarsg, c1))), diffsc(s1, c0))
  findcard2d(hs0, hs1, s0, c0, w0, wcel(cuni(c0), cfv(ccarsg, c1)), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c1)), wcel(cuni(emptycls), cfv(ccarsg, c1)), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1)), wcel(cuni(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  eleq12d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c1), cuni(emptycls), cfv(ccarsg, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  unieq(cv(hs0), emptycls)

  eleq12d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c1), cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))
  unieq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))

  eleq12d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c1), cuni(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(ccarsg, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))))
  unieq(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0))))
  eqidd(cfv(ccarsg, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))))
  eleq12d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c1), cuni(c0), cfv(ccarsg, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c0)
  eqidd(cfv(ccarsg, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  syl5eqel(cuni(emptycls), cfv(ccarsg, c1), cdif(c2, c2), w0)
  eqtr4i(cuni(emptycls), cdif(c2, c2), emptycls)
  uni0()
  difid(c2)
  difelcarsg(c2, c2, c1, c3, w0)
  baselcarsg(c2, c1, c3, w0)
  ex(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1)), wcel(cuni(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  syl5eqel(cuni(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(ccarsg, c1), cun(cuni(cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1))))
  eqtri(cuni(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))), cun(cuni(cv(hs1)), cv(s0)), cun(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(csn(cv(s0)))))
  uniun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))
  uneq2i(cuni(cv(hs1)), cuni(csn(cv(s0))), cv(s0))
  unisn(cv(s0))
  vex(s0)
  unelcarsg(hs2, hs3, cuni(cv(hs1)), cv(s0), c1, c2, c3, wa(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1))))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1)), wf(c1, cpw(c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  syl3an1(wa(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1))), wcel(cv(hs2), cpw(c2)), wcel(cv(hs3), cpw(c2)), wbr(cfv(c1, cun(cv(hs2), cv(hs3))), cle, co(cfv(c1, cv(hs2)), cxad, cfv(c1, cv(hs3)))), w0)

  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1)))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1)), wss(c0, cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  eldifad(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs1), wa(wa(w0, wa(wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1))))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1))))
  simplrr(w0, wss(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cv(hs1))), wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cuni(c0), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cuni(emptycls), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cuni(cv(hs1)), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(cuni(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(s0)))), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))

blocks.name: carsggect
blocks.content: The outer measure is countably superadditive on Caratheodory measurable sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 31-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cpw(c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c1, emptycls), nat0))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wbr(cv(s1), cdom, com), wss(cv(s1), cpw(c2))), wbr(cfv(c1, cuni(cv(s1))), cle, cesum(s2, cv(s1), cfv(c1, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(emptycls, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(c0, cdom, com))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wdisj(s2, c0, cv(s2)))

blocks.name: carsgclctun
blocks.content: The Caratheodory measurable sets are closed under countable union. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm carsgclctun(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cuni(c0), cfv(ccarsg, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cpw(c2), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

blocks.name: carsgsiga
blocks.content: The Caratheodory measurable sets constructed from outer measures form a Sigma-algebra. Statement (iii) of Theorem 1.11.4 of [Bogachev] p. 42. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm carsgsiga(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(ccarsg, c0), cfv(csiga, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cpw(c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, emptycls), nat0))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wbr(cv(s0), cdom, com), wss(cv(s0), cpw(c1))), wbr(cfv(c0, cuni(cv(s0))), cle, cesum(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wss(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cpw(c1))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wcel(cfv(ccarsg, c0), cfv(csiga, c1)), wa(wss(cfv(ccarsg, c0), cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(ccarsg, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(ccarsg, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cfv(ccarsg, c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c0)))))))
  jca(w0, wss(cfv(ccarsg, c0), cpw(c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(ccarsg, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(ccarsg, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cfv(ccarsg, c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c0))))))
  carsgcl(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  3jca(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ccarsg, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(ccarsg, c0), wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c0))), wral(hs0, cpw(cfv(ccarsg, c0)), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c0)))))
  baselcarsg(c1, c0, c2, w0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(ccarsg, c0), w0, wcel(cdif(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c0)))
  difelcarsg(c1, cv(hs0), c0, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccarsg, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccarsg, c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccarsg, c0)), wf(c0, cpw(c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ccarsg, c0)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cpw(cfv(ccarsg, c0)), w0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c0))))
  ex(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cfv(ccarsg, c0)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(cuni(cv(hs0)), cfv(ccarsg, c0)))
  carsgclctun(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2, wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cfv(ccarsg, c0)))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cfv(ccarsg, c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wcel(c1, c2))
  ad2antrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cfv(ccarsg, c0))), wbr(cv(hs0), cdom, com), wf(c0, cpw(c1), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))

blocks.name: omsmeas
blocks.content: The restriction of a constructed outer measure to Catatheodory measurable sets is a measure. This theorem allows to construct measures from pre-measures with the required characteristics, as for the Lebesgue measure. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-May-2020.)

blocks.name: pmeasmono
blocks.content: This theorem's hypotheses define a pre-measure. A pre-measure is monotone. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jul-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmeasmono(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(c0, c1), cle, cfv(c0, c2)))

blocks.name: pmeasadd
blocks.content: A premeasure on a ring of sets is additive on disjoint countable collections. This is called sigma-additivity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jul-2020.)

thm pmeasadd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))= sum*(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` c2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : c3 ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))

  ‚ä£ c4 = { s3 ‚àà P(P(c5))|(‚àÖ ‚àà s3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s3, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s3,((s1 ‚ãÉ s2)‚àà s3 ‚àß(s1 \ s2)‚àà s3))))}
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1[‚âº]_om)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚äî(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)

  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)

} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` ‚ãÉ(s0 ‚àà c1, c2))= sum*(s0 ‚àà c1,(c0 ` c2))), c4 = { s3 ‚àà P(P(c5))|(‚àÖ ‚àà s3 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà s3, ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s3,((s1 ‚ãÉ s2)‚àà s3 ‚àß(s1 \ s2)‚àà s3))))})
